title: Digital Technology-Enhanced Indigenous Language and Literacy Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience in native or second language learning
context.additional_context: Customized digital content and VR simulation environments reflecting Indigenous cultural heritage to support real-life language acquisition

learning_goals: Learners perform five daily conversation scenarios (e.g., market transactions, workplace communication) in indigenous languages with 80% accuracy via VR-based simulation.
Learners master ten essential weekly vocabulary items and grammatical structures with over 90% accuracy using a digital quiz platform.
Learners collaborate with two peers using Google Workspace (Docs, Slides, etc.) to co-create one indigenous language story and produce a 5-minute presentation for in-class delivery.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
